para.text: The File menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Opens the Select New Project dialog box.
Saves the project as another file.
Separates and saves the currently selected element as a unit.
Merges the currently selected unit element to the parent unit (or project).
Deletes the currently selected unit element
Saves the currently selected unit as a file.
Saves the currently selected unit as another file.
Imports a framework into the current project.
Imports a model fragment into the current project.
Saves the currently selected element as a model fragment file.
Saves the currently active diagram as an image file.
Contains a list of the recently opened files.
The Edit menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Cancels the most recent action performed by the user.
Repeats the most recent action performed by the user.
Copies the selected elements to clipboard and removes them from the current location.
Copies the selected elements to clipboard.
Copies the currently active diagram to clipboard.
Copies the currently active diagram to clipboard as Bitmap.
Pastes the clipboard contents into the currently selected element (or diagram).
Deletes the selected view elements in the diagram.
Selects all the elements in the current diagram.
The Format menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Specifies the font for the selected view elements.
Specifies the line color for the selected view elements.
Specifies the fill color for the selected view elements.
Specifies the line style of the selected connection view element as rectilinear.
Specifies the line style of the selected connection view element as oblique.
Shows nothing for the stereotype of the selected view elements.
Shows the stereotype of the selected view elements with text.
Shows the stereotype of the selected view elements with icons.
Shows the stereotype of the selected view elements with decoration.
Suppresses the section that displays the attributes for the selected view elements (e.g. class, usecase, etc.).
Suppresses the section that displays the operations for the selected view elements (e.g. class, subsystem, etc.).
Suppresses the section that displays the attributes for the selected enumerations.
Shows the Word Wrap of the selected view elements.
Shows the parent name of the selected view elements.
Shows the operation signature of the selected view elements (e.g. class, subsystem, etc.).
Shows the property items (e.g. tagged values, changeability attribute, etc.) included in view elements.
Shows the visibility of the compartments of the selected view elements (e.g. attribute compartment, operation compartment, etc.).
Shows the stereotypes of the compartments of the selected view elements (e.g. attribute compartment, operation compartment, etc.).
Automatically resizes the selected view elements.
Brings the selected elements to front.
Sends the selected elements to back.
Aligns the selected elements to left.
Aligns the selected elements to right.
Aligns the selected elements to top.
Aligns the selected elements to bottom.
Evenly distributes the selected elements horizontally.
Evenly distributes the selected elements vertically.
Lays out the view elements in the current diagram.
The Model menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Adds a model element. The model elements that can be added under the currently selected model elements are displayed in the sub menu.
Adds a diagram. The diagrams that can be added under the currently selected model elements are displayed in the sub menu.
Opens the collection editor that can be used to edit the child elements of the currently selected model element.
Opens the constraint editor that can be used to edit the constraints of the currently selected model element.
Opens the tagged value editor that can be used to edit the tagged values of the currently selected model element.
Opens the Verify Model dialog box that can be used to inspect the model elements in the current project.
Generates a new diagram by converting the currently selected sequence (role) diagram into a collaboration (role) diagram (
Generates a new diagram by converting the currently selected collaboration (role) diagram into a sequence (role) diagram (
The View menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Shows the currently selected element in the model explorer.
Toggles the Model Explorer on and off.
Toggles the Diagram Explorer on and off
Toggles the Properties Editor on and off.
Toggles the Documentation Editor on and off.
Toggles the Attachments Editor on and off.
Toggles the Output Window on and off.
Toggles the Message Window on and off.
Toggles the Toolbox on and off.
Automatically adjusts the zoom ratio to fit the whole diagram in the window.
Shows the current diagram at 50% zoom ratio.
Shows the current diagram at 75% zoom ratio.
Shows the current diagram at 100% zoom ratio.
Shows the current diagram at 125% zoom ratio.
Shows the current diagram at 150% zoom ratio.
Shows the current diagram at 175% zoom ratio.
Shows the current diagram at 200% zoom ratio.
Toggles the Standard toolbar on and off.
Toggles the Format toolbar on and off.
Toggles the View toolbar on and off.
Toggles the Align toolbar on and off.
The Tools menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Opens the Options dialog box that can be used to edit various environment configuration options.
Opens the Add-In Manager that can be used to manage the additionally installed Add-In programs.
The Help menu contains the following menu items.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#aca899; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;
